Name: Leaflet Love Story
About the game: English subtitles brought to you by: woosk from Steam group Visual novel, JRPG, Anime and partner website Sinical Network. A short galgame that is sweet and relaxing! An ordinary male engineering student who used to be successful, is now languishing at the bottom in his English classes. A pretty girl who is said to be unapproachable, and is very proud of herself as the legendary Etiquette's Belle. How will the romance between the two of them develop? In order to force someone to learn English well, a friendship that is neither too close nor distant develops. Will they go separate ways, or hold each other's hands tightly? This will all depend on the choices you make. An original work composed by popular light novel author dete_lynn (海潮探长）. Voice casting by popular idol Xiantawutong (闲踏梧桐）. To bring a different light novel and experience with gals to you. (For some Chinese symbols and characters to show up correctly, users are advised to configure their operating system to display Chinese simplified for non-Unicode programs under Regional settings.)
